pr_title: Don't handle dynamic resources by the DevModeHandler

timeline.message:
Don't handle dynamic resources by the DevModeHandler

Fixes #8500

timeline.bodyText: This seems like a simm type of someone (probably me) going for a save with ctrl+s so it should just be cleaned away.
timeline.author: caalador

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/communication/StreamRequestHandler.java b/flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/communication/StreamRequestHandler.java index 6e2b6be5a5..df6c5bd077 100644 --- a/flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/communication/StreamRequestHandler.java +++ b/flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/communication/StreamRequestHandler.java @@ -117,7 +117,7 @@ public class StreamRequestHandler implements RequestHandler { } /** - * Parse the pathInfo for id data. s * + * Parse the pathInfo for id data. *

* URI pattern: VAADIN/dynamic/resource/[UIID]/[SECKEY]/[NAME] *
